data.HTTP:: WebTest) As such, it seems appropriate to live under the HTTP
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
top-level namespace: HTTP This module provides a service to other
    modules in the HTTP namespace (currently HTTP::Monkeywrench and soon
    HTTP:: WebTest) As such, it seems appropriate to live under the HTTP
    top-level namespace.

    lower-level namespace: RecordedSession This module provides an
    interface to sessions that have been recorded to the file system by
    Apache::Recorder.
